AT.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
AT.description: Geh auf deine Startposition und mach dich auf die abgefahrenste Ansammlung von Charakteren gefasst, die man je in einem Rennspiel bewundern konnte! In Konami Krazy Racers™ treten Figuren wie Dracula aus Castlevania™, Goemon aus der Mystical Ninja™-Reihe, Cyborg Ninja aus Metal Gear Solid™ und viele andere auf 16 unterhaltsamen Strecken gegeneinander an. Sammle Glocken ein, um praktische Ausrüstungsgegenstände wie Raketen, einen Schild oder sogar einen, der deine Kontrahenten in Schweine verwandelt, zu aktivieren! Suche nach Abkürzungen und schalte versteckte Strecken und Charaktere frei, während du dich mit deinen Gegnern misst, um der schnellste Krazy Racer auf der Piste zu werden.

AU.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
AU.description: Take your starting positions with the craziest collection of characters to ever grace a racing game! Konami Krazy Racers™ features the likes of Dracula from Castlevania™, Goemon from the Mystical Ninja™ series, Cyborg Ninja from Metal Gear Solid™ and more; each competing across 16 fun-filled courses. Pick up bells to activate useful items like missiles, a shield, and one that even turns your opponents into pigs! Seek out shortcuts and unlock hidden courses and characters as you compete to become the quickest crazy racer on the track!

BG.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
BG.description: Take your starting positions with the craziest collection of characters to ever grace a racing game! Konami Krazy Racers™ features the likes of Dracula from Castlevania™, Goemon from the Mystical Ninja™ series, Cyborg Ninja from Metal Gear Solid™ and more; each competing across 16 fun-filled courses. Pick up bells to activate useful items like missiles, a shield, and one that even turns your opponents into pigs! BE.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
BE.description: Prenez place sur la grille de départ aux côtés de la sélection de personnages la plus folle jamais vue dans un jeu de course ! Konami Krazy Racers™ permet de se mesurer à travers 16 courses déjantées à des personnages comme Dracula de Castlevania™, Goemon de la série Mystical Ninja™, Cyborg Ninja de Metal Gear Solid™ et bien d'autres encore ! Ramassez des cloches pour activer des armes utiles telles que des missiles, un bouclier, et même pour transformer vos adversaires en cochons ! Cherchez des raccourcis et débloquez des courses ainsi que des personnages secrets à mesure que vous affrontez vos rivaux pour devenir le pilote dingo le plus rapide du circuit !

ES.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
ES.description: ¡Colócate en la parrilla de salida junto con los personajes más alocados jamás vistos en un juego de carreras! En Konami Krazy Racers™ podrás encontrar, entre otros, a personajes como Drácula, de Castlevania™, Goemon, de la saga Mystical Ninja™, o Cyborg Ninja, de Metal Gear Solid™, a lo largo de 16 circuitos rebosantes de diversión. Recoge campanas para activar objetos útiles como misiles, un escudo y hasta un artilugio que te permite convertir a tus contrincantes en cerdos. ¡Busca atajos y desbloquea circuitos y personajes secretos mientras compites por ser el piloto más rápido y alocado de la pista!

IT.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
IT.description: Ai posti di partenza per la collezione di personaggi più pazza che un gioco di corsa abbia mai visto! Gareggia nei 16 percorsi di Konami Krazy Racers™ con Dracula di Castlevania™, Goemon dalla serie di Mystical Ninja™, Cyborg Ninja da Metal Gear Solid™ e molti altri. Raccogli le campane per attivare oggetti utili quali missili, uno scudo e persino la possibilità di trasformare i tuoi avversari in maiali! Cerca scorciatoie e sblocca percorsi nascosti e personaggi per diventare il più veloce e pazzo in pista!

LT.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
LT.description: Take your starting positions with the craziest collection of characters to ever grace a racing game! Konami Krazy Racers™ features the likes of Dracula from Castlevania™, Goemon from the Mystical Ninja™ series, Cyborg Ninja from Metal Gear Solid™ and more; each competing across 16 fun-filled courses. NL.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
NL.description: Ben je klaar voor de start om te racen met de gekste verzameling van personages die ooit samen in een racespel gestopt is? Konami Krazy Racers™ bevat peronages zoals Dracula uit Castlevania™, Goemon uit de Mystical Ninja™-serie, Cyborg Ninja uit Metal Gear Solid™ en nog vele anderen, die allemaal meeracen op zestien doldwaze racecircuits. Pak belletjes op om handige voorwerpen te activeren zoals raketten, een schild, en zelfs een voorwerp dat je tegenstanders in varkens verandert! Maak gebruik van sluiproutes en speel verborgen circuits en personages vrij terwijl je probeert om de snelste en gekste coureur op het circuit te worden!

NZ.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
NZ.description: Take your starting positions with the craziest collection of characters to ever grace a racing game! Konami Krazy Racers™ features the likes of Dracula from Castlevania™, Goemon from the Mystical Ninja™ series, Cyborg Ninja from Metal Gear Solid™ and more; each competing across 16 fun-filled courses. Pick up bells to activate useful items like missiles, a shield, and one that even turns your opponents into pigs! Seek out shortcuts and unlock hidden courses and characters as you compete to become the quickest crazy racer on the track!

PL.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
PL.description: Take your starting positions with the craziest collection of characters to ever grace a racing game! Konami Krazy Racers™ features the likes of Dracula from Castlevania™, Goemon from the Mystical Ninja™ series, Cyborg Ninja from Metal Gear Solid™ and more; each competing across 16 fun-filled courses. Pick up bells to activate useful items like missiles, a shield, and one that even turns your opponents into pigs! Seek out shortcuts and unlock hidden courses and characters as you compete to become the quickest crazy racer on the track!

PT.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
PT.description: Prepara-te para correr com o grupo de personagens mais louco que alguma vez participou num jogo de corridas! Konami Krazy Racers™ inclui personagens como Dracula, de Castlevania™, Goemon, da série Mystical Ninja™, Cyborg Ninja, de Metal Gear Solid™ e muitos mais. Todos competem em 16 pistas repletas de diversão. Apanha sinos para ativar itens úteis, tais como mísseis, um escudo e até um item que transforma os teus adversários em porcos! Descobre atalhos e desbloqueia personagens e pistas ocultas, enquanto competes para ser o corredor mais rápido e louco da pista!

RU.name: Konami Krazy Racers™
RU.description: Займите свою позицию вместе с самыми безумными персонажами, которые когда-либо участвовали в гоночных играх! Konami Krazy Racers™ присущи особенности таких персонажей, как Dracula из Castlevania™, Goemon из серии игр Mystical Ninja™, Cyborg Ninja из Metal Gear Solid™ и многих других; которые соревнуются друг с другом на 16 забавных трассах. На пути подбирайте колокольчики, которые активируют такие предметы, как ракеты, щит и даже превращают ваших врагов в свиней! На пути к славе самого сумасшедшего гонщика в округе, находите кратчайшие пути и открывайте новые трассы и персонажи!
